DESK.name: Applications Desk

REPORT.name: Revocation
REPORT.approvals: Licensee Request:No Roll out:AAA Fee Due:License Conditions:Share Holding

REPORT.name: Correspondence
REPORT.wheresql: (fromdepartment is not null) AND (todepartment is not null) AND(ROLENAME = 'LCS')

REPORT.name: Pending Payment
REPORT.wheresql: (approved = '1') AND (pending = '0') AND (paid = '0') AND (ClientPhaseLNA = '0') AND (clientphasename = 'receiving') AND (forlcs = '1') AND (approval = '1')

DESK.REPORT: regions startdate enddate24 inspections compliancescheduleid compliancescheduleid compliancescheduleid compliancescheduleid
> clientname visitdate complianceid complianceid clientid complianceid
